metadata.ground_truth: Mains range from €25–€45 depending on the cut. They also offer a weekday lunch special if you're looking for something more affordable.

conversation.content: Where can I find a steakhouse with outdoor seating?
Prime Grill has a heated outdoor terrace and serves high-quality steaks and wine. It's great for evening dining. Want to know typical wait times?
Prime Grill is moderately priced. Would you like more information?
